name: Keto Cauliflower Hash Browns
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Cauliflower, cheese, and bacon come together in this keto alternative to hash browns.
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place grated cauliflower in a microwave-safe bowl
Wring cauliflower in a clean dish towel, squeezing out as much moisture as possible
Transfer cauliflower to a large mixing bowl
Add Cheddar cheese, egg, bacon bits, chives, salt, pepper, and cayenne
Spray a large baking sheet with cooking spray
Divide cauliflower mixture into 6 equal portions, making sure to leave space between each one
Flatten with your hands and shape into ovals
Bake in the preheated oven until browned, about 15 minutes
Turn broiler on low and broil until crispy, about 5 minutes
Let cool for 5 minutes to firm up
